content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Nesibe Trabelsi. Thank you for showing interest in my apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. However, I must emphasize that I am a landlord and my primary goal is to maximize my gains. Could you please let me know your budget for the monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 300 Euros per month. I want to negotiate with you. I am willing to pay more than 300 Euros if you can give me a good deal. I am a responsible and dependable tenant. I will pay the rent on time every month. I want to be on good terms with you.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Nesibe. Based on the information you have provided, I am willing to accept the rental price of 350 Euros per month. This is a fair price for a 25 square meter apartment in a good location, and I believe it is within your budget. I appreciate your commitment to being a responsible and dependable tenant, and I look forward to working with you in the future.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Can you provide me with the details of the contract? When do you want to sign it?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Certainly, Nesibe. I will prepare a contract for you to review, and we can sign it once you have had the opportunity to review the terms and conditions. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns before signing the contract.

As for the date of signing, we can schedule a time that is convenient for you. Would you prefer to sign the contract in person, or can we do it via email or other electronic means?
name: Heinrich Heine
